meta.name: Celebrity IOU
meta.description: Celebrity IOU is a series where Hollywood A-listers express their deep gratitude to the individuals who have had a major impact on their lives by surprising them with big, heartwarming home renovations that bring everyone to tears.

videos.title: Drums and Demo with John Stamos
videos.overview: In the Dec. 28 premiere episode, John Stamos will surprise Ken, his best friend of 50 years who shares a passion for music, magic and photography, with an astonishing garage and patio renovation at his childhood home. Ken stopped creating music after the death of his father, so John's vision will gift him an inspiring space to play instruments and relax with family and friends. Drew, Jonathan and John, with sledgehammer and saw in hand, will tear down the old garage walls to create a modern, expanded room that features a new drum set on a portable stage, a sleek workstation with built-ins for needed storage and comfy lounge furniture. Outside, John and the Brothers will add to the ambiance by installing a beautiful paver patio, wood-slat succulent wall and fire pit area.

videos.title: Eva Longoria Is Desperate to Design
Mario Lopez Is Saved by the Bros

videos.title: Eva Longoria Is Desperate to Design
Mario Lopez Is Saved by the Bros
Brad Pitt's Gifting a Backyard Pad
videos.overview: Brad Pitt recruits Drew and Jonathan Scott to help him surprise his friend and makeup artist of 30 years by renovating her detached garage. They turn her 400-square-foot unit into a showstopping guest suite, makeup station and storage area.

videos.title: Melissa McCarthy's Hero Home Makeover
videos.overview: Melissa McCarthy heads to Chicago to give back to her aunt and uncle, both retired cops. Melissa creates an upstairs retreat where her aunt can cook and entertain, and a downstairs man cave equipped with all the comforts her uncle deserves.

videos.title: Viola Davis Delivers a Dream Home
videos.overview: Viola Davis heads to Minneapolis to surprise her acting school roommate and best friend of 30 years with a home renovation. Viola works with Jonathan and Drew Scott to create a peaceful sanctuary where this doting mom can finally put herself first.

videos.title: Michael Buble's Shocking Surprise!
videos.overview: Michael Buble pays tribute to his grandfather by fulfilling his final wish: to provide his caretaker with a place to live with her family. Michael calls on Drew and Jonathan Scott to help him renovate his grandfather's house before surprising her with it.

videos.title: Rebel Wilson's Surprise Outdoor Oasis
videos.overview: Rebel Wilson's newly married hairstylist and best friend spent all of her savings to buy a home, leaving the couple with barely any money to renovate their backyard. Rebel works with Drew and Jonathan Scott to turn her barren space into an outdoor oasis.

videos.title: A Mom Renner-vation!
videos.overview: Jeremy Renner is moving his mom to Los Angeles to be closer to her family. He calls on Drew and Jonathan Scott to transform her dated condo into a modern-meets-cozy oasis where she can entertain the family and host sleepovers with her grandchildren.

videos.title: Zooey Deschanel's Stunner for Her BFF
videos.overview: Actress Zooey Deschanel joins Jonathan and Drew Scott to surprise her best friend, Sarah, with a life-changing renovation. The family feels cramped after the arrival of their second baby, so Zooey and the Brothers give them a functional open concept.

videos.title: Allison Janney Gifts a Showstopper
videos.overview: Actress Allison Janney teams up with Jonathan and Drew Scott to give back to her assistant and close friend of 20 years, Ilana. Allison and the Brothers flip Ilana's kitchen and dining room to create a stylish and functional space to cook and entertain.

videos.title: Justin Hartley's Backyard Bombshell
videos.overview: Actor Justin Hartley wants to give back to his buddy, Mat, who he credits for being the rock that saved him in rough times. Justin teams up with Jonathan and Drew Scott to transform Mat's dated backyard into a stunning outdoor oasis for his entire family.

videos.title: Rainn Wilson Surprises His Nanny
videos.overview: Actor Rainn Wilson surprises his son's nanny, Leslie, with a home makeover. After wielding Viking weapons for demolition, Rainn works with Drew and Jonathan Scott to completely update her home, including adding a new kitchen, deck and more.

videos.title: Kris Jenner's Backyard Retreat Surprise
videos.overview: Kris Jenner and daughters Kim Kardashian West and Kendall Jenner want to surprise a family friend looking to start over. Jonathan and Drew look back as they share what it was like to help Kris, Kim and Kendall transform her backyard into a stunning oasis.

videos.title: Leann Rimes' Lifesaving Thank You
videos.overview: Kris Jenner and daughters Kim Kardashian West and Kendall Jenner want to surprise a family friend looking to start over. Jonathan and Drew look back as they share what it was like to help Kris, Kim and Kendall transform her backyard into a stunning oasis.

videos.title: Kevin Hart's Heartfelt Thanks
videos.overview: After helping him through a critical injury, Kevin Hart wants to thank his trainer and friend, Boss, by transforming his backhouse into a sleek man cave. Jonathan and Drew look back as they reveal what went into creating Boss' stylish space.

videos.title: Gwyneth Paltrow's Forever Home Update
videos.overview: Gwyneth Paltrow says her assistant, Kevin, is more like a brother than a colleague, and she wants to transform his dated condo into a stylish forever home. Jonathan and Drew look back at how they turned an impractical layout into an entertainer's dream.

videos.title: Darren Criss Makes Over His Manager's Garage
videos.overview: Darren Criss credits his manager and friend, Ricky, for helping him get to where he is today. Jonathan and Drew look back as they reveal what it was really like helping Darren turn a detached garage into a five-star flex space.

videos.title: Josh Groban's Life-changing Gift to His Bandmate
videos.overview: Josh Groban wants to give his bandmate and friend, Mark, a well-deserved renovation. Jonathan and Drew look back to reveal what it was really like helping Josh surprise his friend with a high-tech recording studio renovation.

videos.title: Tiffany Haddish Returns the Love
videos.overview: Tiffany Haddish wants to return her best friend's unconditional love and support with the stylish home makeover she deserves. Jonathan and Drew look back on how they helped Tiffany make sure her friend's new five-star pad is on point!

videos.title: Howie Mandel's Sensational Surprise
videos.overview: Howie Mandel pulls off the ultimate prank with a surprise home makeover for his best friend and road manager of 30 years. Jonathan and Drew look back on how they turned this bachelor pad into a hip home where his friend can entertain and unwind in style.

videos.title: Snoop Dogg's Winning Gift
videos.overview: Snoop Dogg wants to recognize the impact the commissioner of his football league has had on the community's kids. Jonathan and Drew look back as they help Snoop give a gift like no other by turning a garage into a personalized luxury retreat.

videos.title: Ali Wong's Renovation Surprise for a Dear Friend
videos.overview: Ali Wong's college friend, Citadelle, is a working mother who opens her home and her heart to everyone. Jonathan and Drew look back to reveal how Ali returned the love by transforming Citadelle's barren basement into the entertaining heart of her home.

videos.title: Lisa Kudrow's Stunning Condo Surprise
videos.overview: Lisa Kudrow's cousin and best friend has been through a rough few years, but she's continued to open her heart and home to rescued pets. Lisa brings in Jonathan and Drew to update her cousin's condo into a stylish, functional and animal-friendly home.

videos.title: John C. Reilly's Funky Cabin Makeover
videos.overview: John C. Reilly's longtime friend owns an eclectic junkyard that's a neighborhood hangout, but the property's century-old cabin is in need of help. Jonathan and Drew join in to give the house the modern upgrade it deserves without losing its funky flair!

videos.title: Anthony Anderson's Ultimate Thank you
videos.overview: Anthony Anderson wants to give back to his selfless brother, Derrick, who has been busy working the front lines in the ER during the pandemic. Jonathan and Drew join Anthony in turning his brother's dated house into the modern space his family deserves.

videos.title: Halle Berry's Beautiful Gift for Cherished Teacher
videos.overview: Mega superstar Halle Berry is eager to thank her fifth-grade teacher for having a profoundly positive impact on her youth and identity. She brings in Jonathan and Drew to return the love and surprise her lifelong mentor with a luxurious home makeover.

videos.title: Leslie Jordan's Life-Changing Renovation
videos.overview: Emmy winner and funny man Leslie Jordan calls on Jonathan and Drew to gift his long-time friends of 40 years with a life-changing renovation. Remaining true to their Southwestern style, Leslie delivers a modern refresh to their beloved and cherished home.

videos.title: Idina Menzel's Slam Dunk Reno
videos.overview: Queen of Broadway Idina Menzel gifts a life-changing surprise to her good friend and son's basketball coach. It's a race against the clock as she calls on Jonathan and Drew to turn his unused garage into a showstopping retreat and training facility.

videos.title: Terry Crews' Outdoor Upgrade
videos.overview: Actor and superstar Terry Crews teams up with Jonathan and Drew to deliver his close friend and driver a stunning upgrade to his home's backyard. Terry pulls out all the stops with a stylish outdoor kitchen, dining space and top-of-the-line outdoor gym.

videos.title: Kate Hudson's Extravagant Backyard Build
videos.overview: International movie star Kate Hudson joins forces with Jonathan and Drew to give her future mother-in-law an unbelievable, surprise backyard makeover. Kate gets down to work to turn her tired outdoor space into a luxurious oasis to relax and entertain.

videos.title: Cindy Crawford's Super Remodel
videos.overview: Supermodel icon Cindy Crawford calls on Jonathan and Drew to pull off a surprise renovation for her best friend and personal trainer of 17 years. After years of adversity, Cindy is pulling out all the stops for her friend with a glamorous home makeover.

videos.title: Cheryl Hines Gifts a Garage Makeover
videos.overview: Emmy nominated actress Cheryl Hines is showing her gratitude to her close friend of nearly 20 years with a surprise renovation. She teams up with Jonathan and Drew to transform an underused garage into a gorgeous multi-function guest suite.

videos.title: Wilmer Valderrama's Surprise Garage Reno
videos.overview: Wilmer Valderrama is giving back to his former security guard and best friend of more than 20 years. Wilmer joins Drew and Jonathan Scott to help turn his friend's unfinished garage into a fabulous flex space and guest suite.

videos.title: Drew Barrymore's Spectacular Reno Surprise
videos.overview: Superstar Drew Barrymore calls on Jonathan and Drew to gift her best friend and makeup artist of 20 years with a life-changing renovation. After several tough years, Drew delivers a spectacular home makeover fit for the next chapter of her friend's life.

videos.title: Heidi Klum's Legacy Remodel
videos.overview: Supermodel sensation Heidi Klum teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise her housekeeper of 17 years with a complete house transformation. Heidi pulls out all the stops to deliver a luxurious home where the family can build a lifetime of memories.

videos.title: Kristin Chenoweth's Multi-Generational Gift
videos.overview: Screen and stage superstar Kristin Chenoweth enlists Jonathan and Drew to gift her cherished property managers with a five-star home makeover. Kristin considers them part of her family, and will do whatever it takes to deliver an unforgettable surprise!

videos.title: Glenn Close Gifts a One of a Kind Home
videos.overview: Award-winning movie star Glenn Close joins Jonathan and Drew to surprise her longtime friend with a backyard retreat. Glenn and the brothers go to new heights to deliver a one-of-a-kind gift by creating a place of outdoor solace for the family.

videos.title: Kristin Davis' Dream Home Surprise
videos.overview: Kristin Davis jumps into the world of demo and design to surprise her close friend and fellow single mom with a dream home renovation; she brings in Jonathan and Drew to give the ultimate thank-you by transforming the home.

videos.title: Jay Leno's Multi-Generation Renovation
videos.overview: Jay Leno calls on Jonathan and Drew to help with a special gift for his dear friend, someone he considers like a son. With a newborn on the way, Jay wants to surprise the growing family with a bathroom makeover and a nursery in their century-old home.

videos.title: Derek and Julianne Hough's Fresh Flip
videos.overview: Derek and Julianne Hough jump in with Jonathan and Drew to gift their close friend and trainer. After being forced to close his gym, the Hough siblings want to kickstart his next chapter by spinning his outdated condo into a sleek and personalized space.

videos.title: Taraji P. Henson's Garden Surprise
videos.overview: Taraji P. Henson recruits Jonathan and Drew to give back to the woman she considers like a second mother. Taraji upgrades her beloved backyard into a five-star garden oasis fit for entertaining, her love of potting plants, and relaxation.

videos.title: Emma Roberts' Makeover for Aunt Moo
videos.overview: Emma Roberts teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise her honorary Aunt Mela with a custom kitchen transformation; Aunt Moo lived a philantropic life, so now Emma wants to create an eclectic space for Mela to enjoy her pets, tea, and guests.

videos.title: Everyone Loves a Ray Romano Renovation
videos.overview: Ray Romano gifts his friend and assistant of 23 years with a spa-like upgrade to her main suite. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Ray is not just repairing Christy's outdated digs, but upgrading the space with all the trimmings of a chic boutique hotel.

videos.title: Anna Faris's Swanky Surprise
videos.overview: Anna Faris teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise Amanda, her BFF for the past 24 years. Anna wants to show her immense gratitude with a swanky kitchen and dining room transformation that boasts a hidden speakeasy bar.

videos.title: Regina Hall's Monumental Thank You
videos.overview: Regina Hall is giving back to one of the closest people in her life, who has also been a pillar of support to her for the past 15 years. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Regina surprises her friend's household with a home renovation and so much more.

videos.title: Fran Drescher's Fabulous Thank You
videos.overview: Fran Drescher teams up with Jonathan and Drew to thank her housekeepers of 30 years, whom she considers family. The former Nanny plans to surprise them with a fabulous upgrade to their beloved home and repair structural issues to ensure the home's safety.

videos.title: Mayim Bialik Gifts Backyard Zen
videos.overview: Mayim Bialik calls on Jonathan and Drew to transform her longtime bestie's overgrown backyard into a five-star oasis. With an outdoor kitchen and studio for writing and yoga, this showstopper will provide both tranquility and space for hosting friends.

videos.title: Rosario Dawson's House Glow Up
videos.overview: Rosario Dawson is showing her immense gratitude to the person she has known since she was 19. Plans to update his unique home have gone by the wayside so she wants to take over, leaning on Jonathan and Drew's superpowers to create the ultimate surprise.

videos.title: Zoe Saldana's Electrifying Surprise
videos.overview: Zoe Saldana is giving back to her best friend and makeup artist of 15 years. Zoe is forgoing the special effects and enlisting Jonathan and Drew to embark in a jaw-dropping house transformation that will leave everyone speechless!

videos.title: Sterling K. Brown's Family Affair
videos.overview: Sterling K. Brown is giving back to the woman he considers family and who has cared for HIS family for the last six years. She has purchased her first home, and Sterling wants Jonathan and Drew's help to surprise her with the home of her dreams.

videos.title: Patricia Arquette's Life-Changing Reno
videos.overview: The premiere episode will follow Patricia Arquette's journey to gift Liz, a special family friend of more than 30 years, with a new kitchen and dining area that celebrates her love of cooking and color. Patricia will share details about Liz's desire to remain independent and then jump in to demo the old spaces, smashing out worn cabinets and countertops. Together, she and the Brothers will complete a stylish and functional kitchen for Liz that boasts old world charm and imaginative design solutions, a fresh floor of elegant and durable marble, and a reimagined dining area and indoor garden that incorporates Liz's favorite plants and flowers.

videos.title: Marlee Matlin Crushes the Backyard
videos.overview: Marlee Matlin teams up with Jonathan and Drew Scott to create a deaf-friendly outdoor space - complete with kitchen and spa - for her BFF of over 25 years.

videos.title: Laurence Fishburne's Foolproof Surprise
videos.overview: Laurence Fishburne is giving back to his right hand man and someone he's considered a brother for the past 15 years. Laurence challenges Jonathan and Drew to craft a resort-level backyard retreat where his friend can relax and entertain all year long.

videos.title: Camryn and Milo Manheim's Surprise for Mama Mia
videos.overview: Camryn and Milo Manheim are surprising their longtime family friend and the woman Milo says is like a second mom. The mother-son duo is teaming up with Jonathan and Drew to gift "Mama Mia" a complete and stylish culinary makeover in her beloved kitchen.

videos.title: Mandy Moore's Backyard to Remember
videos.overview: Mandy Moore is returning the love to "Ce-Ce," a woman who has been deeply ingrained in her life for the past 15 years. Mandy is calling on Jonathan and Drew to create the ultimate outdoor oasis for family get-togethers and backyard BBQs.

videos.title: Wanda Sykes Razes The Roof
videos.overview: Wanda Sykes gives thanks to her honorary niece, Amber, whose family has been an integral part of Wanda's life. Now, Wanda's partnering up with Jonathan and Drew for a bedroom and bathroom refresh in a house that's been in Amber's family for generations.

videos.title: Danny Trejo's Backyard Domination
videos.overview: Danny Trejo pulls out all the stops to surprise his ex-partner turned best friend, and her family. "Machete" with the help of Jonathan and Drew transform a wasted space backyard garage into the perfect, multifunctional getaway.

videos.title: Tony Hawk Flips for Friend
videos.overview: The king of skateboarding, Tony Hawk, teams up with Jonathan and Drew to carve out the ultimate hangout and work space for his friend of 10 years. With subtle odes to their love of skateboarding, the team aims to maximize the potential of a small garage.

videos.title: Zach Braff Masters a Custom Remodel
Rob Lowe's Brat Build
videos.overview: In the premiere episode, Rob Lowe will knock on Carol's door with a mariachi band and the Scott Brothers in tow to surprise his dear friend and assistant of 27 years who he says is an integral part of his family. Although Carol has made some improvements to her home, Rob, Drew and Jonathan will work together to give her the stylish and functional kitchen and living areas she's always wanted. When Jonathan unexpectedly falls ill, the popular actor will step out of his comfort zone and go full throttle with Drew to lay new flooring, hang stunning white oak cabinets and install high-end porcelain countertops. During the emotional reveal, Rob will show Carol the many custom features in her new spaces, including a pass-through window to the backyard and a built-in banquette.

videos.title: Andy Garcia Honors a Departed Friend
Kyle MacLachlan's Damn Fine Surprise
videos.overview: Kyle MacLachlan asks Jonathan and Drew to help him surprise the woman who has been an integral part of his family's lives. He wants to use her attached garage to create an extension of her home, creating a stunning multi-purpose flex space.

videos.title: The One With Courteney Cox
videos.overview: Courteney Cox calls on Jonathan and Drew to give back to her close friend with a new baby on the way. Courteney wants to completely makeover the main areas to create function and beauty, and she's even taking inspiration from her own kitchen design.

videos.title: Goldie Hawn Goes Overboard for Friend
videos.overview: Goldie Hawn goes overboard for her very close friend turned family who has been by her side for four decades. Goldie calls on Jonathan and Drew to help create a stunning transformation of the kitchen and living areas, along with a much-needed pantry.

videos.title: Rachel Brosnahan's Marvelous Makeover
videos.overview: In the premiere episode, Rachel Brosnahan—who stars as iconic Daily Planet journalist Lois Lane in DC Studios and Warner Bros. Pictures' Superman in theaters July 11—will gift a spectacular kitchen and dining room makeover to her best friend's parents, Ron and Robin, who have been like second parents to her since college. The couple have dealt with health challenges in recent years, so now, with Drew and Jonathan by her side, Rachel will help turn their small 1970s kitchen into a modern, open space where Robin will love to cook and entertain. Picking up a sledgehammer, Rachel will break countertops, rip out cabinets and tear through walls and then pick every design element, including a large island, dual wood-toned cabinets, Mexican-tiled vent hood and chef-worthy appliances, to give Ron and Robin a dreamworthy kitchen that's both stylish and functional.

videos.title: Can Joel McHale Get Emotional?
videos.overview: Joel McHale expresses his deep gratitude to his family's beloved "LA Grandma." Ever the comedian, he brings his signature humor and reveals a softer side (including a few tears), to give back to the woman who has meant so much to his family.

videos.title: Does Josh Gad Want to Build a Studio?
videos.overview: Josh Gad is surprising his college BFF with a refreshed studio and backyard entertainment space for hosting friends and family. Josh calls on Drew and Jonathan to create a space that inspires creativity and invites community.

videos.title: Shaun White Goes for Reno Gold
videos.overview: Shaun White is taking a break from the slopes to surprise his childhood best friend with an incredible renovation of his new home. With the help of Jonathan and Drew, the three upgrade the dated kitchen and living room to create minimalist sophistication.

videos.title: Jane Seymour Opens Her Heart and Home
videos.overview: Jane Seymour is surprising a cherished friend who has become a true extension of her family. With the help of Jonathan and Drew, Jane aims to doctor up her friend's backyard into a space for entertaining that's truly fit for a queen.

videos.title: Tyra Banks' Next Top Remodel
videos.overview: Tyra Banks is ''Smize"ing her way through a renovation for her best friend from junior high. Tyra shows off her design chops with Jonathan and Drew's help, highlighting the flawsome beauty of her friend's mixed-style home.

videos.title: Drums and Demo with John Stamos
videos.overview: In the Dec. 28 premiere episode, John Stamos will surprise Ken, his best friend of 50 years who shares a passion for music, magic and photography, with an astonishing garage and patio renovation at his childhood home. Ken stopped creating music after the death of his father, so John's vision will gift him an inspiring space to play instruments and relax with family and friends. Drew, Jonathan and John, with sledgehammer and saw in hand, will tear down the old garage walls to create a modern, expanded room that features a new drum set on a portable stage, a sleek workstation with built-ins for needed storage and comfy lounge furniture. Outside, John and the Brothers will add to the ambiance by installing a beautiful paver patio, wood-slat succulent wall and fire pit area.

videos.title: Eva Longoria Is Desperate to Design
Mario Lopez Is Saved by the Bros
